DOC.brief_summary: Clinical study estimate optimal frequency stimulation spinal cord achieve relief back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Spinal Cord Stimulation Pulse Rate On Clinical Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: This feasibility study identify optimal frequency stimulation spinal cord achieve maximum reduction neuropathic back pain measured average Numerical rating Scale . Twenty patient suffer back leg pain recruit study satisfactory pain relief low high frequency stimulation . Each patient receive stimulation four different frequency 2-3 week random blind order . Their pain score function assess use variety different tool . The data use estimate optimal frequency .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Complaint persistent recurrent low back pain , without equal lesser leg pain , least 90 day prior Screen . 2 .
